utils module¶

Utilities Module.

For simple Address Book applet - Project 1 - CIS 422, W‘14, University of Oregon.

author:Abdulrahman Alkhelaifi <abdul@cs.uoregon.edu>
utils.abbreviate_state(state)¶

Return an abbreviation of the given state or an empty string if it does not exist.

Raises KeyError if key does not exist.
utils.open_addressbook(file_name)¶

Open an address book file, returning an AddressBook object.

Raises IOError if file is not found or has no read permission.
utils.save_addressbook(addressbook, file_name)¶

Save an AddressBook object to a file.

Raises IOError if file exist and has no write permission.
